code: @Override public String toString() {     return "Delayer[" + delay + " to: " + getProcessor() + "]". }
public void setId(String id) {     this.id = id. }
public void setDelay(Expression delay) {     this.delay = delay. }

// Implementation methods // ------------------------------------------------------------------------- protected long calculateDelay(Exchange exchange) {     long time = 0.     if (delay != null) {         Long longValue = delay.evaluate(exchange, Long.class).         if (longValue != null) {             delayValue = longValue.             time = longValue.         } else {             delayValue = 0.         }     }     if (time <= 0) {         // no delay         return 0.     }     return time. }
